about_the_game:
Bells 'n' Whistles is a punishing point-and-click game that tests your ability to multitask. The goal of each level is simple: Prevent a machine from breaking down. Each machine has a unique requirement you must meet in order to shut it off successfully. Failing to maintain the machines many systems before it is shut down results in a game over. Are you up to the task?

WARNING: This game is made to be challenging. Some levels are rigorously difficult to complete, but most are beatable. I say "most" because I have reserved a section of levels called "Insane" levels. Unlike all other level difficulties, these levels will not be tested to see if they are able to be beaten. You have been warned.

Note: This game is best played with a mouse


Oh, you want a longer description? Fine, here's a list of features:


  • 30+ levels, ranging from Easy to Insane
  • A tutorial mode so you stand a chance
  • Make one mistake and it's game over
  • Every time you lose, you'll be insulted!
  • Charming pixel graphics


So what are you waiting for? A totally relaxing and not at all rage inducing experience awaits...

name: Bells 'n' Whistles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8, or 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A computer mouse is required to fully enjoy this game

short_description: Bells 'n' Whistles is a difficult point-and-click game that tests your ability to multitask. You must deal with the multiple systems on a machine in order to prevent it from breaking down. Are you up to the task?
